name: presentation-starter
description: A starter kit to make a presentation written in Markdown, using Pandoc and reveal.js

scripts.build: pandoc --standalone -t revealjs --template=template.html -V revealjs-url=lib/reveal.js -V theme=escale -V transition=slide -V slideNumber=true -V center=false --no-highlight presentation.md -o index.html
scripts.push: git push -u origin master && git push -u origin gh-pages

author: David Sferruzza
